not-player: You must be a player to use this command
setstab-desc: Sets the stability of the chunk you are in to a specific value. 1 is neutral stability, less is unstable and more is positive stability. Note that chunks are cubic, so higher or lower chunks in your column will have different values. Tip: Use .debug wireframe chunk to see chunk boundaries.
resetstab-desc: Resets the stability of the chunk you are in to its default value.
getstab-desc: Gets the stability of the chunk you are in.
